'''Resistance is Futile!''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Challenger: Series VI]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to defeat an [[Aeonblight Drake]] that has increased resistance to at least two different elements.
<!--
==Gameplay Notes==
-->
==Trivia==
The name of this achievement is likely a reference to the catchphrase of the Borg, a race of cybernetic beings from the ''{{w|Star Trek}}'' franchise.
